_sText:
**A magic Answerer.**
Ask a question, click the button and this magic device will answer your questions!


Read this:
The materials are in the .zip, these are the func-brushes, Make sure to add these to your cstrike folder.
If you'd liked to add more posibilites, make a func-brush with your texture and add it to the logic-case named randomshit by doing this on the output list:
- OnCase# 
Your func-Brush name
Enable
+
OnCase#
Your func-Brush name
Enable
Delay 4.00
